attributes.action: Discuss the effects the covid jab is having on women's periods.
attributes.additional_details: Because thousands of women have been effected and no one is looking into it. It's been shaked off by the doctors when females periods are getting worse each month. How do you know there isn't going to be long term effects?
attributes.background: I'd like them to discuss the risks and the side effects that the covid jabs are having on females periods. It has been advised 1 period would be effected but it's much more. Why should females get the booster jab to make their periods worse again. What is it actually doing to females?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603905
